Label: Indole-3-acetate
Comment: AKA IAA, Indole Acetic Acid; Indole acetic acid is converted to skatole by Lactobacillus, Clostridium, Bacteroides, and others.

Label: skatole
Comment: Indole acetic acid is converted to skatole by Lactobacillus, Clostridium, Bacteroides, and others.

Label: 5-Hydroxy-L-tryptophan
Comment: 'The neurotransmitter 5-HT is produced in the brain through the Trp hydroxylase 2 enzyme (TpH2), [...], more than 90% of the body's 5-HT is produced in the gut and particularly in enterochromaffin cells (ECs), a specialized subtype of intestinal epithelial cell.'
Unclear which specific protein acts in this reaction
Unclear which specific protein acts in this reaction.

Label: DDC
Comment: In Agus et al, this protein is called 'AAAD', aka 'aromatic amino acid decarboxylase', which is known in UniProt at DCC; AAAD is an unrelated protein and its addition to Figure 2 of this paper is questionable [PMID:29902437]. Fig. 1 [PMID:31825083] mentions AADC, in peripheral synthesis.

Label: TPH2
Comment: produced in the brain; central synthesis

Label: IDO1
Comment: AKA indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase, in both immune and epithelial cells [PMID: 22688187]

Label: TpH1
Comment: AKA Trp hydroxylase 1, produced in intestinal epithelial cells; peripheral synthesis

Label: fldH
Comment: AKA phenyllactate dehydrogenase or indolelactic acid dehydrogenase (ILDH); species: Clostridium sporogenes (strain ATCC 7955 / DSM 767 / NBRC 16411 / NCIMB 8053 / NCTC 8594 / PA 3679)

Label: ArAT
Comment: AKA Aromatic amino acid aminotransferase, group of proteins

Label: KYAT1
Comment: KAT I/glutamine transaminase K/cysteine conjugate beta-lyase 1

Label: TMO
Comment: AKA Tryptophan 2,3-dioxygenase; abbreviation TMO is not know in UniProt (TDO2 is the gene name).

Label: TNA
Comment: AKA Tryptophanase (2); Species: Symbiobacterium thermophilum (strain T / IAM 14863)

Label: porB
Comment: AKA pyruvate : ferrodoxin oxidoreductase B; Species: Helicobacter pylori (strain J99 / ATCC 700824) (Campylobacter pylori J99)

Label: acdA
Comment: AKA acyl-CoA dehydrogenase; Species: Bacillus subtilis (strain 168)

Label: fldH
Comment: AKA phenyllactate dehydrogenase or indolelactic acid dehydrogenase (ILDH); species: Clostridium sporogenes (strain ATCC 15579)

Label: fldB
Comment: AKA phenyllactate dehydratase; fldBC is know as two entries in UniProt (fldB and fldC); Species: Clostridium sporogenes

Comment: AKA acyl-CoA dehydrogenase; Species: Clostridium sporogenes (strain ATCC 15579)
